burn(address,uint256).details: onlyAllowedExchanges - only open to white listed exchange accounts

params._from: Account address from which tokens are burnt

changeController(address).details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

enableTransfers(bool).details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

params._transfersEnabled: true to enable, false to disable

getComplianceContract().details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

getExchangesContract().details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

mint(address,uint256).details: onlyAllowedExchanges - only open to white listed exchange accounts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateCap(uint256).details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

updateComplianceContract(address).details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

updateExchangesContract(address).details: onlyOwner - only open to element36 Account

burn(address,uint256).notice: Burn tokens for given account address

changeController(address).notice: Change to a new controller address

enableTransfers(bool).notice: Enables or disables the token globally

getComplianceContract().notice: Get address of current compliance contract

getExchangesContract().notice: Get address of current exchanges contract

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints new tokens for given account address

onBurn(address).notice: Controller Hook called in controlled Token on every burn.Does all required compliance checks and only allows the burn if user passes them all.

onTransfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Controller Hook called in controlled Token on every transfer.Does all required compliance checks and only allows the transfer if user passes them all.

onTransfer(address,uint256).notice: Controller Hook called in Token on transfer. Has no _to because this fx is used in a wallet-free context Does all required compliance checks and only allows the transfer if user passes them all.

updateCap(uint256).notice: Set a new Cap for the Token

updateComplianceContract(address).notice: Update to a new compliance contract

updateExchangesContract(address).notice: Update to a new exchanges contract
